Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed near Oakton
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are standing near Oakton due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are standing near Oakton due to debris on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, #97 Skokie or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Laflin
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses temp. rerouted EB: Madison, Ogden, Washington, Loomis and Madison; WB: Madison, Racine, Randolph, Ogden and Madison due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Madison/Laflin, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Madison, Ogden, Washington, Loomis and Madison.

Westbound buses will operate via Madison, Racine, Randolph, Ogden and Madison.

Allow extra travel time.
